Name: Sub Problem
Configuration Settings.Description: Provides results from one previous Korali execution.

Name: Psi Problem
Configuration Settings.Description: Provides results from the hierarchical problem (Psi).

Name: Psi Variable Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in the Psi problem.

Name: Theta Variable Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in the Sub problem.

Name: Psi Problem Population Size
Internal Settings.Description: Number of samples on the Psi problem.

Name: Sub Problem Population Size
Internal Settings.Description: Number of samples on the sub problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Coordinates
Internal Settings.Description: Coordinates for each sample on the psi-problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Log Likelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: Likelihood for each sample on the psi-problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Log Priors
Internal Settings.Description: Log Priors for each sample on the psi-problem

Name: Sub Problem Sample Coordinates
Internal Settings.Description: Coordinates for each sample on the sub-problem.

Name: Sub Problem Sample Log Likelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: Likelihood for each sample on the sub-problem.

Name: Sub Problem Sample Log Priors
Internal Settings.Description: Log Priors for each sample on the sub-problem.
